text: Hagi Adonizama kema hige'za ne'zama nene'za musema hunaku'ma enaza, vahe'mo'za ne'zama ne'za musema huvagama nere'za Solomoni naga'mo'zama musema nehu'zama hazama'a antahi'naze. Hagi Joapu'ma ufenkrafama nentahino'a, amanage hu'ne, na'a nehu'za Jerusalemi rankumapintira rankea nehu'za ke hakarea nehaze? huno zamantahige'ne.
